docs.snippet: For the first time in a half-century, the N.F.L. draft will not be conducted in New York next year. Commissioner Roger Goodell said Thursday that the league was considering moving the draft to Chicago or Los Angeles in 2015....
docs.lead_paragraph: For the first time in a half-century, the N.F.L. draft will not be conducted in New York next year. Commissioner Roger Goodell said Thursday that the league was considering moving the draft to Chicago or Los Angeles in 2015.
docs.abstract: Commissioner Roger Goodell says NFL draft will not be held in New York in 2015, for first time in a half-century; league is considering moving to Chicago or Los Angeles; other football news noted.

headline.main: N.F.L. Draft Moving Out of New York
headline.print_headline: Draft Moving Out of New York

docs.snippet: Germany took over the top spot; the Americans’ exciting World Cup performance did not translate; and several European teams paid for dismal performances in Brazil....
docs.lead_paragraph: Germany took over the top spot; the Americans’ exciting World Cup performance did not translate; and several European teams paid for dismal performances in Brazil.
docs.abstract: United States men's soccer team drops in FIFA rankings despite exciting performance at the 2014 World Cup; FIFA has used rankings to determine how 32 teams in World Cup are seeded.

headline.main: U.S. Slips in FIFA Rankings Despite Its World Cup Effort
headline.print_headline: U.S. Slips in FIFA Rankings Despite Its World Cup Effort

docs.snippet: While many have howled about complying with a proposed rule slashing greenhouse gas emissions from power plants, Minnesota has been reining in its utilities’ carbon pollution for decades....
docs.lead_paragraph: While many have howled about complying with a proposed rule slashing greenhouse gas emissions from power plants, Minnesota has been reining in its utilities’ carbon pollution for decades.
docs.abstract: Minnesota has mandated sharp reductions in energy use in every new state-financed building for more than a decade, and in renovated buildings for more than five years; those mandates includes new stadium for Minnesota Vikings; state has also set deadlines for utilities to increase amount of electricity generated from renewable sources.

headline.main: Without Much Straining, Minnesota Reins In Its Utilities’ Carbon Emissions
headline.print_headline: Without Much Straining, Minnesota Reins In Its Utilities’ Carbon Emissions

docs.snippet: The Alabama women’s gymnastics coach Sarah Patterson, who was hired by Bear Bryant in 1978 and won six national titles, is retiring because of two coming knee replacements....

docs.abstract: University of Alabama women’s gymnastics coach Sarah Patterson, who was hired by Bear Bryant in 1978 and won six national titles, is retiring because of two coming knee replacements.

headline.seo: Sarah Patterson Steps Down as Alabama Women’s Gymnastics Coach
headline.main: At a Football Powerhouse, Her Teams Rolled, Too
